title: OrAru paDai
sahitya:
OrAru paDai vIDuDaiya sIrALanaDi sEruvEn


anupallavi

  IrAru karattAlum sOrAdu koDai vazhangi pErAdaravu puriyum pErALan aruL kOri


caraNam    tIrAda tollai yAvum tIra avan pAda malarai mArAda bhaktiyuDan manamArat-tudi sheidu
nErAna neri ninru pOrADi ibbhuviyil sIrAna vAzhvu peTru pErAnandam uTriDa
